name: Rolling Cubed
description: Ever wanted to be a ball that grows with points while dodging deadly cubes falling from the sky?!? No...? Me neither. However, a simple game for a simple desire: An aspiring game developer breaking the glass ceiling that is simply getting something out there. I know there are a lot more mechanics and things I could implement into this, however, this is meant to be a bare-bones type of game. Although, any feedback/advice would be much appreciated.
